title: Cape, second half 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallics
Technique: embroidery; lined with satin
description: Small cape for an ecclesiatic figure, the "Bambino". Silver metal cloth with foundation of white silk. Small floral sprays of polychrome silk set into a winding chain of gold sequins and imiation amethysts. Lined with pink satin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cape, second half 18th century.Medium: silk, metallics
Technique: embroidery; lined with satin. 1899-2-2.
